apps.title: This Website
apps.description: A recent rewrite of my personal web site using Clojurescript

apps.title: Express Outbound
apps.tagLine: An ExpressJS library that extends response mechanism.
apps.description: Enhance your ExpressJS app's middleware chain to allow access to the response before being sent out. Designed to be used for logging or enriching responses.

apps.title: Git Push It
apps.description: An open source project for playing appropriate music while pushing your code with git.

apps.title: Stumblr
apps.tagLine: Map an Epic Pub Crawl. Right Here. Right Now.
apps.description: Some friends and I made @stumblr_app so we could have an app that we could use to go out and celebrate the app we were making. We thought it would be fun to interface with Google Maps API and Twitter API to let users find some nearby bars to go to and tweet about it. Earn fun badges as you go. #stumblr

apps.title: Space Raptors
apps.tagLine: Defeat the carnivorous raptors. The universe needs you.
apps.description: A game-jam style group project primarily built over a week and a half. Most people on the team, myself included, had any prior experience with either Unity3D or making games. My primary contribution was enemy AI.

apps.title: Pizza Time
apps.description: In a time that I was learning a ton about server-side programming, I wanted to see if I could still do something fully front-end. I threw this together in an hour or so in response to a joke that emerged early that day among my friends. Is it weird that I'm more proud of this than anything else in my portfolio?
